attributes.action: Urge the collective nations of the United Nations to use military force to remove Mugabe from power in Zimbabwe and install a UN led administration for 12 months before holding fair and democratic elections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The situation in Zimbabwe needs addressing by the collective power of the UN.  People are dying both from starvation due to the policies of Zanu PF and direct attacks by Zanu PF militia.
The only true alternative is being prevented from running a fair election campaign by the intimidation and direct action of the ruling party.
The international community needs to send a community to this repressive governments that mal-treatment of citizens of the world will not be tolerated - and the UN is prepared to take direct action.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
